column4: SO i would like to install a game, I've extracted the folder, but now what?
what kind of game?
what kind of game is this?
it does not sound linux based
is this a windows game?
well you can use apt-get for those
which game is this?
hmm snowball isn't supported by apt
so you are looking to compile this game?
compiling is very complicated...
to install it you need to configure it, compile it, then install it
which can be a hard and dangerous thing
if you do not know what you are doing
i suggest you find a game supported with apt
if it is supported by apt, why don't you apt-get install <package>
apt-cache search
apt-cache search <keyword>
i already searched
try apt-cache search game |less
look for a supported game
wesnoth is one of my favourites
did you add all the repositories?
